metadata.description: Code analysis skills for Claude Code: complexity hotspots, tech debt, defect prediction, architecture review, and more

plugins.name: assess-impact
plugins.description: Analyze blast radius before changing specific files. Use before refactoring core components, making breaking API changes, or modifying shared code to identify affected files and stakeholders.

plugins.name: audit-architecture
plugins.description: Audit module coupling, cohesion, hidden dependencies, and design smells. Use when conducting architecture reviews, evaluating design decisions, or identifying structural tech debt.

plugins.name: audit-flags
plugins.description: Identify stale feature flags and prioritize cleanup. Use when cleaning up flags after launches, during monthly hygiene reviews, or before major releases.

plugins.name: check-quality
plugins.description: Check code quality against thresholds for complexity, duplication, and defect risk. Use as a quality gate in CI/CD pipelines or before merging PRs.

plugins.name: find-bugs
plugins.description: Locate likely bug locations using defect prediction, hotspot analysis, and temporal coupling. Use when triaging production incidents, investigating recurring bugs, or prioritizing QA effort.

plugins.name: focus-review
plugins.description: Identify high-priority areas to focus on during code review. Use before reviewing PRs or when triaging large changesets.

plugins.name: onboard-codebase
plugins.description: Generate onboarding guide with key symbols, architecture overview, and subject matter experts. Use when joining a new project, onboarding team members, or getting oriented in unfamiliar code.

plugins.name: plan-refactoring
plugins.description: Identify highest-priority refactoring targets based on TDG scores, complexity, and code clones. Use when planning refactoring sprints, reducing tech debt, or improving code maintainability.

plugins.name: report-debt
plugins.description: Generate comprehensive tech debt assessment with quantified metrics and prioritized issues. Use for sprint planning, stakeholder reporting, or justifying refactoring investment.

plugins.name: target-tests
plugins.description: Identify files and functions most needing test coverage based on risk, complexity, and churn. Use when prioritizing test writing or improving test coverage strategically.

plugins.name: track-trends
plugins.description: Analyze repository health trends over time using historical git commits. Use for monitoring codebase health, detecting quality regressions, or measuring improvement initiatives.
